title: 12/11/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 12/11/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show we're joined by MLB Hall of Famer Johnny Bench,Rocket Beat writer Jonathan Feigen, Patriots insider Tom Curran, and Multi Grammy award winner Michael Buble'. What's the future hold for James Harden and Cam Newton on their respective teams? Why was Johnny Bench selling his memorabilia? Plus, the guys sing for Michael Buble' and he returns serve with a new Stat of the Day jingle.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
